.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.ISchemaBindableMapper GetSchemaBindableMapper(class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IHostEnvironment env, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.IPredictor predictor, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.CommandLine.SubComponent`2<class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataScorerTransform, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.SignatureDataScorer> scorerSettings) cil managed

Public Shared Function GetSchemaBindableMapper (env As IHostEnvironment, predictor As IPredictor, scorerSettings As SubComponent(Of IDataScorerTransform, SignatureDataScorer)) As ISchemaBindableMapper

Docs.summary: Given a predictor and an optional scorer SubComponent, produces a compatible ISchemaBindableMapper. First, it tries to instantiate the bindable mapper using the (this will only succeed if there's a registered BindableMapper creation method with load name equal to the one of the scorer). If the above fails, it checks whether the predictor implements directly. If this also isn't true, it will create a 'matching' standard mapper.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.CommandLine.SubComponent`2<class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.IDataScorerTransform, class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.SignatureDataScorer> GetScorerComponent(class Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Data.ISchemaBoundMapper mapper) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetScorerComponent (mapper As ISchemaBoundMapper) As SubComponent(Of IDataScorerTransform, SignatureDataScorer)

Docs.summary: Determine the default scorer for a schema bound mapper. This looks for text-valued ScoreColumnKind metadata on the first column of the mapper. If that text is found and maps to a scorer loadable class, that component is used. Otherwise, the GenericScorer is used.
